snippet: The federal police arrested three former lawmakers who are suspected of involvement in a corruption scheme at the state-run oil giant Petrobras. They are the first politicians to be arrested in the scandal.
abstract: Three former Brazilian lawmakers are arrested in connection with ongoing bribery and corruption scandal involving state-run oil company Petrobras; first politicians to be arrested in scandal, the three are accused of being involved with black-market money dealers in scheme involving at least $800 million in bribes.
lead_paragraph: The federal police arrested three former lawmakers who are suspected of involvement in a corruption scheme at the state-run oil giant Petrobras. They are the first politicians to be arrested in the scandal.

headline.main: Brazil: 3 Ex-Lawmakers Arrested in Corruption Case
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: 3 Ex-Lawmakers Arrested in Corruption Case
